wikitext.*:
{{short description|Ninth chairman of the Tolkien Society}}
'''Sally Kennett''' was the ninth Chairman of [[The Tolkien Society]]. She was appointed on [[8 January]] [[2009]], before being elected on [[26 April]] later that year. Serving for over four years, Kennett stood down at The Tolkien Society's AGM on [[20 April]] [[2013]] and was replaced by [[Shaun Gunner]]. From 1998 to 2009 Kennett served as the Tolkien Society's secretary and contributed to ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'' through the regular columns "Sally's Snippets" and "Behind Glass Doors". During her time as both Chairman and Secretary she also served as the Tolkien Society's Librarian.
